description.raw:
Added functions to enable sensor's scene update to be done manually for performance reasons. Currently all rendering sensor updates will call `rendering::Scene::PreRender` to update the scene graph before the actual render operation. This is inefficient when there are multiple sensors in the scene. Setting the manual scene update mode gives the flexibility of performing a scene update only once per frame before making the sensor render calls.

Note that there are existing test failures and should be fixed by [ign-rendering pull request #180](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/pull-requests/180/fix-scene-cleanup/diff)
